name: Titan Abyss
description:
Mission Overview:

Orbital scans revealed an open body of water on Jupiter’s moon Titan.  

Survey drone LD-48 will be dispatched to collect suspected organic compounds on Titan.

Drone will transmit collected data and initiate shutdown sequence when power has been exhausted

Keyboard Controls:
WASD or Arrow Keys to pitch and turn
Shift to throttle up
Space to throttle down

Xbox Controller:
Left stick / D-pad to pitch and turn
A button to throttle up
B button to throttle down

____________________________
A game by Roger || PROJECTaroid
for Ludum Dare 48
made using Godot 3.3, Blender 2.92, Reaper Audio, and Arturia Analog Lab 4
Fonts: DS-Digital and Roboto from dafont.com

NOTE: The web player version may run slow on some browsers and machines.  The GLES3 version of the Web game was replaced with a GLES2 version.  The change should provide better stability and make the game playable on more browsers.  For the best playing experience download the Windows version.  

Source Code:
The full Godot 3.3 project is included in the source code (except for the music, player model, and a particle effect).
